findings.title: ERC-20 return values ignored
findings.description: The return values of ERC-20 calls are never checked, which can lead to bugs with tokens that return false on failure.

findings.title: Incomplete Staking Model
findings.description: The staking system is currently not connected to the price feed reward system and lacks slashing or penalization mechanism for not supplying or providing incorrect data.

findings.title: Double provision of safe math functions
findings.description: Medianizer.sol defines its own safe math library but also imports Open Zeppelin’s implementation.
